import React from "react"; import classnames from "classnames"; // reactstrap components import { Button, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardFooter, CardImg, CardTitle, Form, Input, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText, InputGroup, Container, Row, Col, UncontrolledDropdown, DropdownToggle, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem } from "reactstrap"; import axios from 'axios'; // core components import LoginNavbar from "components/Navbars/LoginNavbar.jsx"; import Footer from "components/Footer/Footer.jsx"; class Products extends React.Component { state = { squares1to6: "", squares7and8: "" }; componentDidMount () { document.body.classList.toggle("register-page"); document.documentElement.addEventListener("mousemove", this.followCursor); } componentWillUnmount () { document.body.classList.toggle("register-page"); document.documentElement.removeEventListener( "mousemove", this.followCursor ); } followCursor = event => { let posX = event.clientX - window.innerWidth / 2; let posY = event.clientY - window.innerWidth / 6; this.setState({ squares1to6: "perspective(500px) rotateY(" + posX * 0.05 + "deg) rotateX(" + posY * -0.05 + "deg)", squares7and8: "perspective(500px) rotateY(" + posX * 0.02 + "deg) rotateX(" + posY * -0.02 + "deg)" }); }; render() { return ( <>

this.setState({ emailFocus: true })} onBlur={e => this.setState({ emailFocus: false })} /> this.setState({ emailFocus: true })} onBlur={e => this.setState({ emailFocus: false })} /> this.setState({ emailFocus: true })} onBlur={e => this.setState({ emailFocus: false })} /> this.setState({ passwordFocus: true }) } onBlur={e => this.setState({ passwordFocus: false }) } /> this.setState({ passwordFocus: true }) } onBlur={e => this.setState({ passwordFocus: false }) } /> Payment method... { this.state.paymentMethods.map(paymentMethod => ({ paymentMethod.name })) }
); } } export default Products;
